Description: Example 1
INPUT
{
  message: {
  battery: 100,
  temperature: 28.1,
  humidity: 57.5,
  co2: 1127,
  pressure: 1008.8
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 100 },
  co2Level: { unitId: 'ppm', record: 1127 },
  temperature: { unitId: 'Cel', record: 28.1, nature: 'Air' },
  humidity: { unitId: '%RH', record: 57.5, nature: 'Air' },
  pressure: { unitId: 'hPa', record: 1008.8, nature: 'Air' }
}
